name: Snake 3D Lite
description:
Snake Eater, the 3D game for iPhone and iPad
Welcome to the time-based food hunter, Snake 3D Lite game

The main features:
- Eat red item(s) for getting points and becoming longer
- Once you reach a required score, you will get a level up
- You may eat yellow item(s) to become even longer (x10) immediately
- Eat white item(s) to get faster speed or Green item(s) to get bonus time
- Avoid blue item(s), boundary walls, trees, rocks and any obstacles on your way

** This app is optimized for iPhone 5SE, iPhone 6(s), iPhone 6(s) Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X and all iPad devices.
